summary: The implementation covers all five requirements with backend data model extensions, frontend UI components, React Query mutations, and display logic. All requested features for editable payment links and QR codes in both Services and Payments pages are present.

hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not mention data migration infrastructure or migration modules. While the constraint mentions 'Existing services are migrated to include null values,' this likely refers to backward compatibility in the data model, not a separate migration module.

hallucinated_features.description: QR code generation via external API (api.qrserver.com)
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-1 mentions 'QR code generation via backend API or custom image upload,' but the implementation uses a third-party external API (api.qrserver.com) in the frontend rather than a backend API endpoint.
